attributes.action: For the government to cover Self Employed Salaries
attributes.additional_details: This needs to be done as self employed people like trades men and women who work hard and are self employed, cannot survive on £94 a week and ‘ordinary’ workers are paid upto £2,500 a month!
attributes.background: I want the government to give the same rights to self employed workers like they have done to businesses who employ people.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
